function.name: setcell
function.description: Sets value at cell column, row in Excel spreadsheet sheet. column and row can either be an index number (1,5) , or a readable indicator (A, 5). row can be omitted by putting the full cell indicator in the second parameter (A5). Note that column and row in numeric form are 1-based (counting starts at 1) to make them compatible with string-based lookups.When value is of type date the following format will be applied: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss. Please note that the provided sheet will not have its row and column counts updated for performance reasons. Use getsheet afterwards instead.
